prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that can float and has a playful demeanor.
I want to design a Psychic-type creature with a sleek, minimalistic design.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of dreams and has soft, pastel colors.
Make a small, cute Pokemon with large expressive eyes and a long tail.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that can teleport and has a mysterious aura.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines elements of both cat and mouse.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that looks ethereal and can blend into its surroundings.
